医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
释放希望：艾滋病患者认知障碍的治疗方法即将出现研究人员研究了艾滋病毒患者神经认知障碍风险增加的机制，并探索了潜在的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Unlocking-hope-Promising-treatments-for-cognitive-impairment-in-HIV-病人-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Unlocking-hope-Promising-treatments-for-cognitive-impairment-in-HIV-病人-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efb750e6-27c7-42b2-bb70-ced477a5eec6 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 02:49:00 -0400 Unlocking hope: Promising treatments for cognitive impairment in HIV patients on the horizon
种族和潜在可改变的危险因素对痴呆症的影响潜在可改变的风险因素对痴呆症的影响因南亚人、黑人和白人而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ethnicity-and-the-effect-of-潜在-可修改-风险因素-on-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ethnicity-and-the-effect-of-潜在-可修改-风险因素-on-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0ed6e84-0b1c-4bf9-929c-76b9ec560eb1 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 02:44:00 -0400 Ethnicity and the effect of potentially modifiable risk factors on dementia
BioLizard 推出新的 BioVerse 平台以加速生命科学研发流程BioLizard 是一家生物信息学、数据分析和数据管理服务及咨询公司，致力于生命科学行业的数字化转型，今天宣布推出新的 BioVerse 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/BioLizard-launches-new-BioVerse-Platform-to-accelerate-life-sciences-RD-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/BioLizard-launches-new-BioVerse-Platform-to-accelerate-life-sciences-RD-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=678797f2-17c8-4cff-8aaf-5e622be767df Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:39:00 -0400 BioLizard launches new BioVerse Platform to accelerate life sciences R&D processes
雷诺现象的遗传原因已确定伦敦玛丽女王大学精准医疗研究所 (PHURI) 和柏林夏里特医学大学柏林健康研究所 (BIH) 的研究人员已经确定了雷诺现象的遗传原因。他们的研究结果今天（10 月 12 日）发表在《自然通讯》杂志上，可能会为雷诺氏症患者带来第一个有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Genetic-causes-of-Raynaude28099s-phenomenon-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Genetic-causes-of-Raynaude28099s-phenomenon-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15645ca1-41c2-4323-8063-c8afcc4dc603 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:37:00 -0400 Genetic causes of Raynaud’s phenomenon identified
莉莉警告说，老年人和弱势群体面临家庭低温的威胁SaaS 公司 Lilli 表示，去年冬天一些家庭的气温低至 5 摄氏度，需要紧急采取干预措施，防止老年人和弱势群体的健康面临风险。Lilli 是一家使用主动护理生活方式监测技术来彻底改变护理方式的 SaaS 公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Elderly-and-vulnerable-people-at-risk-from-low-home-temporals-warns-Lilli.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Elderly-and-vulnerable-people-at-risk-from-low-home-temporals-warns-Lilli.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7defdc1-6985-46dd-8ca0-a8381a8308fe Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:33:00 -0400 Elderly and vulnerable people at risk from low home temperatures, warns Lilli
智能手术刀可以为机器人设备进行的手术铺平道路一项研究表明，带有内置传感器的手术刀可以简化外科医生的培训，并为机器人设备执行的手术铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Smart-scalpels-could-pave-the-way-for-surgeries-performed-by-robotic-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Smart-scalpels-could-pave-the-way-for-surgeries-performed-by-robotic-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=526b23cb-5178-4eaa-a7a1-79f66b2968ef Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:31:00 -0400 Smart scalpels could pave the way for surgeries performed by robotic devices
OrganaBio 成立新部门，以满足对分散临床试验支持不断增长的需求OrganaBio 是专门从事细胞和免疫疗法开发解决方案的合同技术开发和制造组织 (CTDMO)，今天宣布正式推出细胞加工和冷冻保存 (CPC) 服务，这是 OrganaBio 的一个新部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/OrganaBio-launches-new-division-to-meet-having-demand-for-decentralized-clinical-trial-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/OrganaBio-launches-new-division-to-meet-having-demand-for-decentralized-clinical-trial-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709535ca-460f-4cb7-a722-59859e32d887 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:28:00 -0400 OrganaBio launches new division to meet growing demand for decentralized clinical trial support
曼彻斯特大学的新出版物深入探讨了心理健康状况不佳的原因和挑战曼彻斯特大学今天（10 月 10 日）纪念世界心理健康日，推出了一份新出版物，深入探讨心理健康状况不佳的原因和挑战，并提出一系列建议，帮助政策制定者改善数百万人的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/University-of-Manchesters-new-publication-offers-insight-on-causes-and-challenges-of-poor-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/University-of-Manchesters-new-publication-offers-insight-on-causes-and-challenges-of-poor-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3724b14-5d5c-4c12-85b6-0b12aeb328a9 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:27:00 -0400 University of Manchester's new publication offers insight on causes and challenges of poor mental health
学校自行车计划与改善青少年心理健康有关体力活动对心理健康有积极影响，但活动率正在下降。这尤其令人担忧，因为青少年的心理健康持续恶化。在美国，六分之一的学童被诊断患有某种类型的精神障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/School-cycling-program-linked-to-improved-mental-well-being-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/School-cycling-program-linked-to-improved-mental-well-being-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9c52311-df71-43c4-ab75-53602d6d2bc5 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:22:00 -0400 School cycling program linked to improved mental well-being in adolescents
UVA科学家的努力可以帮助更好地对抗抗生素耐药细菌弗吉尼亚大学的研究人员正在努力战胜两种因快速对新抗生素产生耐药性而闻名的危险细菌，科学家们的努力可以帮助我们更好地更广泛地对抗抗生素耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/UVA-scientiste28099-efforts-could-help-better-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/UVA-scientiste28099-efforts-could-help-better-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec9832e4-ef78-44fc-ab2e-9ef726c35153 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:18:00 -0400 UVA scientists’ efforts could help better combat antibiotic-resistant bacteria
